DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Aiptasia_Sym_B_MicSat_Fla2
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Nucleotide alignment of DNA sequences from microsatellite flanking region loci CA4.86 and Si15. The alignment includes Symbiodinium minutum associated with Aiptasia from field collected and cultured specimens as well as Symbiodinium samples collected from other hosts.
